text: Jaroslav Jurka (born 8 July 1949) is a Czech fencer. He competed at the 1976 and 1980 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Czech male fencers Category:Czechoslovak male fencers Category:Olympic fencers of Czechoslovakia Category:Fencers at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Fencers at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Olomouc
title: Jaroslav Jurka
